name: Lock Down Your Life - I Hunt Stalkers

content.html: I love how TikTok is the app to hate on but then every other social app and the harm they do is also ignored. Hot Take: Just throw away your phone. It's a perfect solution with zero nuance.
content.value:
I love how TikTok is the app to hate on but then every other social app and the harm they do is also ignored. 
Hot Take: Just throw away your phone. It's a perfect solution with zero nuance.
